attributes.action: allow Al Bangura of Watford Football Club to remain in the UK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a Watford FC supporter, I feel more than qualified to confirm what a huge part he plays in our community.
Al Bangura is a law abiding, tax paying citizen who has no desire to be a burden upon the state, but simply wants to remain in the United Kingdom with his family and not return to Sierra Leone where his personal circumstance dictates he would not be safe.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
